messages.subject: RE: why doesn't she go to school
messages.msgSnippet: My kids are such smarty pants they often say things like that too!   My now 13 yr old told someone when she was 6 that she tried school and it made her brain
messages.messageBody:
My kids are such smarty pants they often say things like that too! My now 13 yr old told someone when she was 6 that she tried school and it made her brain sleepy!! It's funny to me that even at such a young age she could articulate how boring she found school!

Lisa B
